Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Addison. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems at Addison. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Rockwell
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Western, Jackson, California, and Madison due to, street blockage at Madison/Rockwell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Madison, Western, Jackson, California, and Madison due to, street blockage at Madison/Rockwell.

Allow extra travel time.
